TITLE: Delivery
DEF: Strategies for the presentation of instructional material
TASK: The Delivery Modes pattern supports the various methods used to present instructional content to learners. To effectively use DEMOD, offer multiple formats such as in-person, online, blended, and hybrid learning experiences. This approach accommodates diverse learning preferences and is especially effective when each mode is well-structured, engaging, and universally accessible. The challenge lies in ensuring quality, inclusiveness, and equitable resource distribution across different modes.
